caption:
The beginners guide to @conair SOFT WAVES 💫🌟💌

I’ve invested in every Conair product over the last three weeks, and I’m putting each one to the test. First up: Soft Waves—a heatless method that’s incredibly easy to use and perfect for short to medium hair lengths. 🌈

✨ How I Used Them:

1️⃣ Started with a leave-in on 70-80% dry hair. This is key for hold!

2️⃣ Wrapped the hair around the rollers. 🪄

3️⃣ Let the magic happen! MORE TIME = TIGHTER CURL, LESS TIME = SOFTER WAVE 

COMMENT “CONAIR” and I’ll send you the link to these rollers! 💌 

#HeatlessCurls #ConairSoftWaves #HairHack
